topic.title: Status of vaccine in China?
topic.body:
Hello. Curious if anyone has information about vaccine distribution in China.

Is there currently vaccination against SARS-CoV-2 (Coronavirus / COVID-19) being distributed in China?

If there is distribution of this vaccine then how is it being implemented?

Is it provided in pharmacies like a flu shot or is it given by a doctor only?
Or is rumour true that the government is distributing the vaccine now?

Thank you.

1606080511_134skDNbvpgm7WpAjiJzbc6dQEfBa.body:
> [driud](#comment_177_18yZKKFySP5bvmNy14T9vgj3H99AC1PQkH): Because it's 100% - controlled.

Try explaining this to clearnet only users and they will say you are crazy though lol

1607283206_1GmSP4jfJEvcrTYaDmsfocWCXETGP.body:
> [sj29msn5kz0ldmn](#comment_25_1H9ZCecP2nbVicgXB77yqodz2xp4CmKxm4): of course they have a cure for their own manufactured controlled epidemic virus since its start, but they dont care about their slave citizens so they wont give it to them soon probably

Likely, but I would like some information from those residing in China themselves.

There seem to be members of this forum in HK and Mainland China who may have more insight.

1607271673_1Nz5xXKiiTFGd6big5zcBnaGVH3hU.body:
> [sj29msn5kz0ldmn](#comment_26_1H9ZCecP2nbVicgXB77yqodz2xp4CmKxm4): bitcoin is shit, use monero

I feel similarly, but Bitcoin is what will allow people to enter into the world of cryptocurrency due to its mass adoption by mainstream organizations and such. Monero  is definitely the best privacy coin though by far.

P.S. If you hear rumours about it being able to be traced, they are false. There is some company who claimed they could trace it, but the CEO later said in a Tweet that its impossible to trace Monero at present. Total lie.

1606985120_19mYz8QAzpKevxXrku9vV6WoQN7cP.body:
> [bigbadbob](#comment_1216_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): Decentralized and resistant to censorship.  Whats not to like about that?Zeronet is the way the clearnet should be IMO.  The information here is safe so long as there are users.

That's how the clearnet was originally designed if I am not mistaken, but then corporate greed took over and the tech giants centralized stuff because of the big $$$ it could bring them. Now, users of the clearnet know no difference yet, but there's more and more talk among the politicians about it so in theory we should experience an uptick in users of decentralized and federated networks at some point in the near future I imagine.
